song.title: Nonniin Mit√§s Sit..
song.info:
Lyrics translated directly
spoken: i am a fairy, i am a big boogie man, you are all schizos!
once, a long time ago, a man traveled along a road, encountered a bush-cricket who knew almost everything, it sure told you, (you could) ask anything, it provided answers as if from a drugstore's shelves
then the man happened to ask something totally stupid, the bush-cricket did not answer, it took brass knuckles, and beat him up hard ...ouch!
well, well, well, we would have been saved from this, had we been just a bit smarter (2x)
(repeat from *)
